message: Let's split it 50/50 and be done with it!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but still a good deal!
I'll give you a slightly better deal this time, but don't expect me to go easy on you!
I'm not getting any younger, I want a bigger share now!
You're not getting any younger, but I'm not going to give in to your demands just yet!
I'm not budging, take it or leave it!
You're being stubborn, but I'm still willing to make a deal. Don't push me too far!

You're not getting any more generous, are you? Fine, I'll make a final offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to get taken advantage of, I want most of it!
I've had enough of your games, Bob. I'll give you the whole thing, but don't think this is a victory for you. It's a defeat for both of us.
